Overview

The following is an 'at-a-glance' summary of the item(s) available in this listing.
Item: Onkyo Super Audio CD / SACD / CD player C-S5VL
Condition: Pre-Owned For Parts See Description
Original Packaging: Yes

Description

This Onkyo SACD plays CDs and SACDs, and sounds great. I've been the only owner and I've been very happy with it, with one exception. At some point the eject functionality started to get spotty. So while disks load and play fine, sometimes when you try to eject the disk, it will not eject. The workaround is to open the unit (via screws on the bottom) and manually remove the disk, but obviously this is not ideal. I don't want to deal with getting it repaired, but it could be a small thing that someone with some skills may be able to fix it for free. The top has a some scratches that you can see in the photos, but nothing major, and none on the front. Remote, power cord and original packaging included.

Includes:

  • Onkyo C-S5VL player
  • Onkyo C-S5VL remote
  • Power cord
  • Original packaging

Again unit functions and plays fine, however the eject functionality will intermittently fail to work. See description.

Manufacturer's description:

  • Plays Super Audio CD, Audio CD, CD-R, CD-RW, MP3 CD, and WMA CD*
  • VLSC (Vector Linear Shaping Circuitry)
  • High-Grade WolfsonÂ® 192 kHz/24-Bit D/A Converter (WM8742) with DSD Bit-Stream Support for Super Audio CD Applications
  • Thermally Regulated Crystal Oscillator and Jitter-Cleaner Device to Stabilize Clock Frequency
  • 2 Digital Outputs (Optical and Coaxial)
  • Digital Out On/Off
  • 19 mm-Pitch Audio Terminals for High-Grade Cable
  • Digital Filter Control (CD: 5 Modes, Super Audio CD: 4 Modes and DSD Direct)
  • Phase Control
  • Repeat Modes (Super Audio CD and CD: Disc/Track/A-B Repeat, MP3 CD and WMA CD: Disc/Track/Folder/A-B Repeat)
  • Random Modes (Super Audio CD and CD: Disc, MP3 CD and WMA CD: Disc/Folder)
  • Headphone Jack with Volume Control
  • 4-Mode Display Dimmer (Normal/Dim/Dimmer/Off)
  • Hi-Rigidity, Anti-Resonant Flat Chassis (1.6 mm Thick)
  • Aluminum Front Panel
  • Heavy-Duty Inlet Power Cord
  • RI-Compatible Remote Control
*Discs that have not been properly finalized may only be partially playable or not playable at all.
